np: To begin with,\nCity Y emerged with a population of 10 thousand
np2: Back to the beginning,\nCity Y emerged with a population of 10 thousand
Then,\nthe mayor began to stimulate the economy
Then,\nmore jobs were created and more immigrants came
Then,\neconomic growth led to better healthcare\nand less death rate
Then,\nCity Y has a population of 800 thousand
Then,\nexperts predict that the population\nwill continue to increase
Then,\nthe population will pass 2000 thousand by 2022
Then,\nthe bigger population will make\nthe city keep expanding

np: In 2025, it will become a giant city in 2025\nHow could this happen?
np2: At last,\nit will become a giant city in 2025
